title: Projects,chalices, ca. 1930
medium: Pencil, yellow watercolor, white heightening, black crayon, creamy paper
description: Vertical rectangle. Bordering line as 1939-84-20. In Gothic style. Polygonal foot; hexagonal shaft. Tracery and a cross at the foot. Medallion with A [the descender of a p bisecting an X; Greek letter omega] respectively at the knob.

tombstone.epitaph: Projects,chalices, ca. 1930.Pencil, yellow watercolor, white heightening, black crayon, creamy paper. 1939-84-79-a.
